Html:
The HtmlAgilityPack.chm file that is a part of the downloadable zip isn't showing me any information. Is there an online copy of this help file? Any alternative to view it?

I am stuck on creating a usable DLL from the solution. Am not too familiar with Visual Studio so could anyone describe how to 'build the project under release mode' and 'add a reference to the newly built DLL'?

Starting with XP SP2, microsoft started blocking chms. Search for how to enable them. I know in Vista there's a different step to enable them than in xp.

I'm hoping to start creating new help documentation with SandCastle+DocProject in the future. The new version does have an Intellisense XML file with it.
Hi, have you tried to right click and select Properties and then you should see just below the Advance button the Unblock button.
